biotools.summary:
immersive visualisation of single cell spatial omic data.

starmap is a web-based VR-enabled tool which combines a 3D scatter plot with star plots (radar chart) to visualise hundreds of thousands of multivariate data points, such as single-cell expression data, imaging single cell data, spatial transcriptomic data and etc.

bioschemas.name: starmapVR
